meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound used in the production of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The resorcinols are essential for creating vibrant dyes.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use resorcinols to make various medicines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled resorcinols all over the lab!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a bubbling cauldron of resorcinols, mixing colors and cures.
meanings.sent5: The resorcinols danced in the beaker, creating a magical potion.

meanings.definition: Plural form of resorcinol, a type of chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: The shelves were stocked with resorcinols for the experiments.
meanings.sent2: The researchers needed resorcinols for their study on chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The resorcinols in the lab seemed to have a party of their own!
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, resorcinols were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of resorcinols filled the room, signaling progress in the project.
